/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC   -shared -Wl,-soname,libusb_cam.so -o /home/jbmdumont/catkin_ws/devel_isolated/usb_cam/lib/libusb_cam.so CMakeFiles/usb_cam.dir/src/usb_cam.cpp.o -lavcodec-ffmpeg -lswscale-ffmpeg /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libimage_transport.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libmessage_filters.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libclass_loader.so -lPocoFoundation -ldl /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libroslib.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/librospack.so -lpython2.7 -lboost_program_options -ltinyxml2 /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libcamera_info_manager.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libcamera_calibration_parsers.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libroscpp.so -lboost_filesystem -lboost_signals /opt/ros/lunar/lib/librosconsole.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/librosconsole_log4cxx.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/librosconsole_backend_interface.so -llog4cxx -lboost_regex /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libroscpp_serialization.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/librostime.so /opt/ros/lunar/lib/libcpp_common.so -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lboost_chrono -lboost_date_time -lboost_atomic -lpthread -lconsole_bridge -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/lunar/lib:
